select ANNOTATION_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL AS KEY FROM DUAL
insert into ANNOTATIONS (KEYID, KEYTOREFERENCE, ANNOTATOR, GRADE, CONTENT, WHENINSERTED, OPTIMISTICLOCKINGVERSION) values (#key#, #keyToReference#, #annotator#, #grade#, #content,handler=clobHandler#, #whenInserted#, #optimisticLockingVersion#)
